name: NOVAKOVSKY
description:
LEADERBOARD WORKS ONLY IN THE WINDOWS VERSION!

As a famous chef, you arrive at your local bakery to get back on it's feet! However, the bakery is in a complete disarray, so there is a lot of work ahead of you!

Features: 

- Three unique minigames - as a famous chef, it is up to you to show off your culinary skills. In these minigames, you will be tested at mixing the right ingredients, baking the food properly and sorting out the dishes!

- Global leaderboard - Pick your preferred pastry and fight for it's honor in global leaderboards! (WINDOWS ONLY)

- Only two buttons? - Yeah, that's correct. This game is a submission for Mini Jam 94, in which the theme was "Baking" and limitation was "Only two buttons"
